pkgmetadata.longdescription: Airborne LiDAR Filtering Method Based on Multiscale Curvature // Multiscale Curvature Classification of ground returns in 3-D LiDAR point clouds, designed for forested environments. 'RMCC' is a porting to R of the 'MCC-lidar' method by Evans and Hudak (2007) doi:10.1109/TGRS.2006.890412.
